statement.p: Consider the note D4 which has frequency 293.665 Hz.
What is the period for D4?
What is the wavelength for D4? ft
Recall that the speed of sound is 1116 feet per second. This is a scientific measurement. Round accordingly.

solution.p: Period is the inverse of frequency, so \displaystyle\frac{{1}}{{293.665}}\approx{0.003405240665384}\approx{0.00340524}.
Wavelength is a unit conversion: \displaystyle\frac{{{1116}\ \text{ ft}}}{{\text{second}}}\cdot\frac{{{1}\ \text{ second}}}{{{293.665}\ \text{ cycles}}}\approx{3.8002485825686}\approx{3.800}.
